Reviews.Title: Buy this one!
Reviews.Author: Robert Pellet
Reviews.Content: Fast delivery. Met or exceeded my expectations.A pleasure to use right out of the box. Now I can put my Toshiba Satellite laptop in the trash where it belonged from day one. Toshiba customer service had to be the worst customer service I have ever dealt with!

Reviews.Title: professional writer
Reviews.Author: luv2read
Reviews.Content: hard spacebar,fast,nice storage capacity.the computer was easy to set-up.it is lightweight and has a long battery life compared to my older laptop.i have been satisfied overall with acer computers.

Reviews.Title: Acer Aspire windows 7 laptop
Reviews.Author: olga cecilia angiolini
Reviews.Content: Computer arrived on time. It was so easy to make it work. I was able to easily download the security program that I wanted, and my husband is using the computer with no trouble at all.I only need to change the font inside the computer and I have not been able to figure that out. Other than that we are happy with the computer and finding the computer online thru amazon was very easy and convenient.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size and speed for my needs
Reviews.Author: L. Riley "1961 Imperialist"
Reviews.Content: I have been using my Acer for a few months now and am very happy with its performance thus far.  I use graphics and video software, so I needed a system that wouldn't become bogged down.  So far, this model has done VERY well.  I can have several programs open at once, cutting and pasting between them, and this unit keeps up.

Reviews.Title: Great Entry-Level Notebook
Reviews.Author: S. L. Case
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these notebook computers for my grandchildren, aged 9 and 12.  They were thrilled!  They both have been using their Dad's laptop for homework assignments--research and word processing.  They found this notebook very easy to set up and use.  Of course, they like being able to watch DVD's on the notebook and to play some games, but these are mostly so they can do their school work.  I think they will last them for several years.  One advantage of this model is that it has Windows 7, which is what they were used to using.  I had read so many bad reviews about Windows 8 that I was happy to find a notebook that had Windows 7.

Reviews.Title: very nice laptop
Reviews.Author: Mark Wilkinson
Reviews.Content: After finally getting this laptop,and having my youngest son set it up for me, I am very pleased with it. No issues so far. This was a christmas gift to my fiancee as her old laptop was litteraly falling apart. The screen is huge which she really likes. The only downside according to my son was that it took most of an evening to get all the stuff off of it that comes with the unit. I am computer challenged so I,m not sure what all it was so I take his word for that as he is an IT professional. All good otherwise.

Reviews.Title: Exactly What I Needed
Reviews.Author: brittdelys
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop to replace one that was dying. I basically needed it to connect to the internet and run MS Office software. It works beautifully. The only complaint I have is the speakers. They work fine but sometimes it's difficult to hear them, even with the volume all the way up.Definitely a good buy for a cheap laptop though.

Reviews.Title: Awsome purchase!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Queen "A . Q."
Reviews.Content: The notebook is easy to operate from the box to my desk I just plugged it in and started working. It was that easy. It has met all my expectations and more I will buy another one without out a doubt.

Reviews.Title: Liking my Acer a lot
Reviews.Author: kurlyk8
Reviews.Content: I've had my Aspire for over three months now and can say that, as expected, I'm liking it a lot.  It's more of a basic laptop, which is just what I was looking for and, it just so happened that my sister was 'in the market' for a replacement laptop too, so she bought the same model.  So far we're each happy with the decision

Reviews.Title: Just loving my Aspire computer.
Reviews.Author: Keith Walker
Reviews.Content: I had a windows 8 and found it just to complicated to navigate. I sold it to a friend and ordered widows 7. My Aspire is all I need and love it.

Reviews.Title: Pleased with my purchase
Reviews.Author: A. Mitnick "Handy Computer Geek"
Reviews.Content: I bought this notebook for my wife for Christmas.  It arrived as scheduled and my wife really likes the display quality and how lightweight it is to carry around.  I like the fact that it was shipped with Windows 7 instead of 8.

Reviews.Title: Very Basic--Does What I Need It To Do
Reviews.Author: Kevin M Morgan
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Acer as a non-Windows 8 for basic home use.  With phones and Chromebooks and Tablets, we only needed something for the occasional document or spreadsheet.  It works, does what it is supposed to for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Replacement for my Son's Family
Reviews.Author: Mr. Tom J. Young
Reviews.Content: My son and his wife broke their Dell laptop and it was going to cost almost as much to fix it as this new, fast computer.  Great deal, good quality

Reviews.Title: laptop/notebook
Reviews.Author: taurus
Reviews.Content: My daughter love this laptop it works well for her school work, music, social media, etc. Will recommend this notebook

Reviews.Title: Bought 2
Reviews.Author: DOLORES A. MAHLER
Reviews.Content: We bought two of these computers primarily because it runs Windows 7.  We refuse to use 8 and 7 is fast becoming hard to find.  One was for our daughter and the other replaces our 6  year old Dell.  I shouldn't say "replace" as I am using it and my husband has taken possession of the new Acer.  He loves It!  The picture is fantastic and it has all the features he wanted.  I have a problem with the keyboard, as my Dell does not have the numbers and I keep  putting my hands on the wrong keys..for now I will stick to my Dell until it decides to die..which, believe me, will be sooner than later.  Delivery was fast, as usual and it arrived safely.  It was ready to go right out of the box. Has all the features one could want including a webcam.  A great value.

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: Molly Propst
Reviews.Content: DO NOT BUY THIS LAPTOP!  It is terrible.  You can only have one window open or it locks up.  One evening the keyboard decided not to work.  I have had to unplug the computer to run the battery down to shut it off to reboot.  Basically, this computer is a piece of junk.  I took this laptop to my computer guru, he determined that it arrived with a nasty virus.  It took him hours to fix so I spent more money getting it fixed than I did on the initial purchase.  I will never purchase an ACER product again and I will never purchase another electronic item from Amazon. SHAME ON AMAZON FOR NOT COMING TO MY ASSISTANCE!!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Leroy
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my cousin and it seems like a very nice laptop. She seems very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: My Acer
Reviews.Author: Felicia Thurston "Felicia"
Reviews.Content: I like this lap top but I think my previous Acer worked better. This one is already slowing down and I haven't had it for two months yet.

Reviews.Title: Runs for one day and quits
Reviews.Author: Norbert B schramm
Reviews.Content: After receiving the ACRE a day early I promptly went to work to load the programs I need and copy all the important file over from my old lap top. IT ran great for a day. The second day I decided to make a bootable CD but it said it couldn't find the CD drive. I had used it without a problem the day before.I figured a reboot might fix the problem. AS it turned out I never booted. Threw up the ACER splash and shut down 2 seconds later.A call to ACRE tech support end up  with me sending the unit to the repair depot in Texas. Now I have to wait a couple of weeks to get  it back and hopefully it will keep running.I'm not so sure about recommending the model.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Steve Vogt
Reviews.Content: Its junk the worst laptop I've owned I'd send it back in a minute if I could for a refund
